subject: Re: How to unit test Eclipse Plugin and RCP?
msgSnippet: Hi You can use AppPerfect DevTest for testing eclipse plugin. Integrate DevTest in your development Eclipse and use UnitTester for testing plugins. The product
messageBody:
Hi

You can use AppPerfect DevTest for testing eclipse plugin. Integrate
DevTest in your development Eclipse and use UnitTester for testing
plugins.
The product will automatically generate testcases for each method in
your plugin. Product also has nice UI for adding/editing testcases.

Regards,
Sudhan

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "isaachanstar" <isaachanstar@...> wrote:
>
> hi, all
>
> Could anyone make some suggestions of how to unit test Eclipse Plugin,
> especially RCP application? There are any strategies, tips, or tools
> in your brains and toolboxes?
>
> Thanks!
>
